alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Magoffin; Martin; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Martin, southern Johnson, northeastern Perry, northern Knott, Floyd, eastern Breathitt and southeastern Magoffin Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from Mashfork to Daisydell to Dice. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Evanston, Ballot, Conley, Riceville, Mashfork, Ivyton, Burning Fork, Bradley, Tiptop and Marshallville around 630 PM EDT. Patrick, Leander, Denver, Waldo, Dobson, Swamp Branch, Vail, Duco, Bonanza and Carver around 635 PM EDT. Orchard, Collista, Fitz, Gunlock, Ordway, Staffordsville, East Point, Fredville, Mid and Gapville around 640 PM EDT. Paintsville, Prestonsburg, Hindman, Woodland Estates, Perston Estates, Buffalo, Pyramid, West Van Lear, Thelma and Hagerhill around 645 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Boons Camp, Wells Chapel, Williamsport, Bobbs, Dock, Blue River, Yellow Mountain, Offutt, River, Soft Shell, Martin, Bolyn, Handshoe, Beaver Junction, Allen City, Arkansas, Mousie, Alphoretta, Chestnut, Larkslane, Inez, Estill, Wayland, Allen, Porter Junction, Garret, Emma, Alvin, Betty and Banner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Magoffin; Martin; Perry
